metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1983 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The client_host function in parsers.c in Privoxy before 3.0.24 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and crash) viaan empty HTTP Host header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.21-7+debu1build0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: privoxy package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.21-7+debu1build0.14.04.1').
